RootErrorBoundary.title: Unmanaged error
RootErrorBoundary.message: An unmanaged error occurred and the application is broken, try refreshing your browser.

ModuleErrorBoundary.title: Unmanaged error
ModuleErrorBoundary.message: An unmanaged error occurred inside a module. Still, other parts of the application are fully functional!

AppRouterErrorBoundary.title: Unmanaged error
AppRouterErrorBoundary.message: An unmanaged error occurred while bootstrapping the application.
